metadata.name: Potential Suspicious Change To Sensitive/Critical Files
metadata.comment: Detects changes of sensitive and critical files. Monitors files that you don't expect to change without planning on Linux system.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/cat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/echo')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/grep')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/head')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/more')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/tail'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('>')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/emacs')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nano')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/sed')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/vi')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/vim'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/login')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/passwd')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/boot/')) OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*/etc/.*\.conf.*' OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/cron.')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/crontab')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/hosts')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/init.d')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/etc/sudoers')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/opt/bin/')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sbin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/usr/bin/')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/usr/local/bin/'))))

output.summary: Detects changes of sensitive and critical files. Monitors files that you don't expect to change without planning on Linux system.

metadata.objective: False positive: Some false positives are to be expected on user or administrator machines. Apply additional filters as needed. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/defender-for-cloud/file-integrity-monitoring-overview#which-files-should-i-monitor
